header: 2Workflow: Design of a Compound AI System

images.caption: Figure 2:Credit assignment: a localvs.a global approach.In backpropagation, the optimizer updates each parameter individually. In trace propagation, the prompt contains the execution trace, which allows it to generate all updated variables in a single call. Note that the loss is a textual feedback. In addition, the gradient of the instruction isnotthe gradient of the output, but the gradient of the instruction with respect to the gradient of the output.
